About the Company: Jindal Photo Limited, company of B.C. Jindal Group, was incorporated in the year 1986. Jindal Photo Limited is market leader in the Photographic business segment in India, for marketing & selling the Consumer Photo Imaging Products under `Kodak` brand. and Medical X-Ray under "Fujifilm" brand. Jindal Photo is Indias one of the largest manufacturer of photographic and Medical products. The product range includes Photographic Color Paper, Photographic Chemicals, Thermal Printers & Media, Cine Color Positive Film, Graphic Products, Medical X-Ray Films & Equipments.
